players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I think we should focus on gathering information before rushing to vote. We don't have enough clues yet to accuse anyone confidently."

You: "I agree with Charlie that we need more information, but I don't think silence always means guilt. Diana might just be cautious. Let's keep observing and see if anyone acts suspiciously."
